description:
53 million Americans currently do some form of freelance work and that number is rising. As the freelance community grows, so does the need for you to understand that you need to think like a business and work on your marketing (and brand).

Through using a tried-and-tested framework created specifically for freelancers and solopreneurs, Get The Gig! will help you to land your next gig, expand and engage with your network, gain more work or business - as well as to support you in having a long and successful freelance career.

You'll learn how to:

  • Discover your personal values and understand how they impact the types of projects that you are looking for, or business that you take on
  • Discover additional products and services that you may have previously over-looked
  • Identify your strengths and realise how these can lead to creating more business opportunities and revenue streams
  • Find the opportunities in your industry
  • Understand how being yourself, and knowing your brand, will actually bring your more work
  • Create an actionable marketing plan that will get you to the next level
title: Get The Gig! Marketing Basics For Freelancers & Solopreneurs
